1.3.0.name: wordpress/shop-my-label-media-marketplace-engine
1.3.0.description:
Shop My Label Media Marketplace Engine lets you sell items with an onsite cart and checkout. Create shop windows at http://www.shopmylabel.com/create. Use the embed button to get the Wordpress snippet to include in your post. This plugin expands those snippets to be fully browsable and shoppable shop windows on your sites.

Before installing, you need to get an SSL certificate from your hosting provider. We also recommend use of the Wordpress HTTPS plugin http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wordpress-https/. When you can connect to https://yourblogname.com and not see any errors in the padlock in the URL bar, you are ready to install MME.

This plugin will add a few urls to your blog to handle adding MME to your blog. The only link you may want to add to your template is
